attributes.action: Recind the postponement of all local elections
attributes.additional_details: Election of local Government within the prescribed periods is the democratic right of every eligible UK Citizen. We believe that the postponement of the local elections is a direct infringement of our democratic rights, and this infringement appears to be a commercial one, with no consideration of Democracy.
attributes.background: Rienstate the postponed local elections in the 9 areas of the United Kingdom.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Do not postpone the local elections
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710155
